posts.title: Irish History Tales Website
posts.content:
I have created a very simple website that will cover both Irish History Tales and my novel Verses in the Sand, I have found that the TikTok algorithm has really started to work against me and I'm now going to have a YouTube first focus and priority with my content

I will continue to use TikTok and to tell the chronological story of Ireland but I'll also be focusing on some of the forgotten figures from Irish History.

I would be extremely grateful for any support you can provide the channel, whether it be a simple like or comment, or to check out my book series. Book 2 will be released very soon.

posts.title: The Pretty Dragoon
posts.content:
I really enjoyed researching and developing the content for the latest edition 'The Pretty Dragoon', which was a nickname given to the Irish woman - Kit Cavanagh, an extraordinary woman who joined the British army and served undiscovered in the army for 13 years.

She had been a tavern owner in Dublin and after her beloved husband was 'pressed' into the British Army, she volunteered to join the army to find him. During her search, she even duelled and killed a fellow soldier in a dispute over a woman, and a prostitute even accused her of being the 'father' of one of her children.
